summary: Innovative Generative AI Engineer with a strong foundation in building enterprise-grade GenAI systems from concept to production. Experienced in developing scalable architectures, driving framework development, and enabling rapid prototyping of AI solutions in domains like healthcare, insurance, HR, and services. Proven ability in translating innovative business ideas into scalable and practical industry grade applications through a deep understanding of the GenAI stack, cloud-native development, and end-user experience.

education.degree: B.E. (Computer Engineering with Honours in AI & ML)

description: Led the architecture and development of robust, scalable Generative AI solutions, combining LLMs, modular RAG pipelines, and containerized microservices for production-grade deployment across AWS environment.
GenAI-In-A-Box Framework: Conceptualized and built an internal GenAI framework that standardizes and accelerates the full lifecycle of generative AI applications:
Designed plug-and-play pipelines for Modular, Hybrid, and Advanced RAG workﬂows using Python, LangChain and LlamaIndex
Integrated evaluation frameworks (RAGAS, Giskard, Phoenix) and safety guardrails to ensure reliability and trustworthiness
Enabled seamless LLM integration (Gemini Flash/Pro, Claude Sonnet/Haiku, AI21 Models), with model-speciﬁc routing, function calling and chat history features

Delivered persistent, fault-tolerant Dockerized deployments using Docker, Docker Compose; deployed on AWS ECS(Fargate) along with services like ECR, VPC, ALB in place for scalable and secure api serving
Engineered backup-resilient VectorDB containers(FAISS, Chroma, Pinecone) using persistent volumes to ensure data durability and service uptime
Production-Ready Use Cases (FastAPI backend + Streamlit frontend):
Insurance Agent (Hybrid RAG): Built a domain-aware assistant with Gemini Pro + FAISS for precise policy retrieval and conversational answering
Hospitality Agent RAG with Function Calling: Combined LangChain Agents and MongoDB to enable full CRUD operations via natural language
Audiobook Generator: Developed a multimodal pipeline that transforms web/PDF content into spoken dialogues using Claude 3.7 Sonnet and generate conversational audio with AWS Polly
HR Candidate Pre-Screening RAG: Built a rerank-enhanced RAG that extracts structured insights from resumes and evaluates candidate ﬁt
Website Concierge Chatbot: Designed and deployed an Advanced RAG-based assistant embedded into the company site to streamline customer queries and service navigation
Implemented crop classiﬁcation system using Random Forest algorithm on multispectral satellite data, combining Landsat-8 and Sentinel-2 imagery to achieve 85% Classiﬁcation accuracy
Developed scipts in Google Earth Engine for processing satellite imagery and calculating crop acreage estimations across multiple districts
Conducted comprehensive 10-year time series analysis using phenological parameters (NDVI, LAI, FPAR)
Documented methodology and ﬁndings in detailed technical report, including data collection methods, pre-processing steps, and model architecture with results and conclusion

projects.name: Chronic Kidney Disease Prediction Using Hybrid Algorithms
description: Developed a hybrid deep learning model using ANN and Cuckoo Search Algorithm to predict CKD.
Achieved 92% prediction accuracy through hyperparameter tuning.
Built a preprocessing pipeline that reduced data noise by 40%.

projects.name: Cross-Platform Course Comparison System
description: Engineered an ML-powered tool to compare courses across Coursera, Udemy, and YouTube.
Implemented sentiment analysis using Random Forest and NLTK on user reviews and comments.
Designed a custom rating algorithm with Count Vectorizer, achieving 87% accuracy.
